title: Tools for Accessing Chesterfield County VA Geographical Data
text: chestergeo provides interface accessing data Chesterfield County’s OpenGeoSpace. includes publicly-available data describing county infrastructure, school voting boundaries, utility locations, locations police/fire/EMS responses, among others.

title: Tools for Accessing Chesterfield County VA Geographical Data
text: core function provided package get_geo_data(). function takes “layer” argument, defines OpenGeoSpace layer retrieve data . can see layers available available_layers object (well within layers_crosswalk data). example, might interested retrieving middle school boundary data: returns sf object: can plot object just sf object.  Likewise, wanted see major roads county:
